mapper.select: SELECT u.user_no, p.product_no, p.product_disp_st, p.product_name, p.product_price, p.product_reg_dt, p.product_edit_dt, i.product_img_no, nvl(f.favorite_cnt, 0) as favorite_cnt, nvl(c.comment_cnt, 0) as comment_cnt FROM USER_TB u INNER JOIN PRODUCT_TB p ON u.user_no = p.product_seller LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_no, min(product_img_no) as product_img_no FROM PRODUCT_IMG_TB GROUP BY product_no) i ON i.product_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_no, count(1) as favorite_cnt FROM FAVORITE_TB f WHERE favorite_del_fl = 'N' GROUP BY product_no ) f ON (p.product_no = f.product_no) LEFT JOIN (SELECT product_no, count(1) as comment_cnt FROM product_comment_tb GROUP BY product_no) c ON (p.product_no = c.product_no) WHERE u.user_no = #{userNo}
